items.sentence: Tom and Mary weren't able to eat as much as they wanted.
Tom was the one who told me that Mary wanted to do that.
I'm afraid that we don't have time to do that right now.
You should probably not park that close to the campfire.
Which would you prefer to do, go swimming or go sailing?
I don't think that I could ever convince Tom to do that.
The only sound to be heard was the ticking of the clock.
Tom couldn't answer my question, and neither could Mary.
The last time I was in Boston, I only stayed three days.
I'm looking for somebody to teach French to my children.
